snippet: An Oklahoma judge found JPMorgan was “grossly negligent and reckless” in its administration of one client’s trust account and ordered the bank to pay $18 million and punitive damages.
abstract: An Oklahoma judge found JPMorgan was “grossly negligent and reckless” in its administration of one client’s trust account and ordered the bank to pay $18 million and punitive damages.

headline.main: J.P. Morgan Ordered to Pay $18 Million to Oil Heiress's Trust
